me.aliceq.garbler

Class GarblerTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aliceq.garbler.GarblerTranslator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GarblerTranslator.MapBased

    public abstract class GarblerTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
    Alphabet for a Garbler library which transposes a standard character into a variant character

    • Nested Class Summary

        Returns:
        a new GarblerTranslator instance

      • createFromFile

        public static GarblerTranslator createFromFile(java.lang.String file)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a GarblerTranslator from a translator file. Each line in a translator file should be of the form oldChars=newChar, where oldChars is a comma-separated list of keys. For example, to transpose [c,k,q] into q's the file should contain the entry c,k=q
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read from
        Returns:
        a new GarblerTranslator instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem reading the file

      • createFromFile

        public static GarblerTranslator createFromFile(java.io.File file)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a GarblerTranslator from a translator file. Each line in a translator file should be of the form oldChars=newChar, where oldChars is a comma-separated list of keys. For example, to transpose [c,k,q] into q's the file should contain the entry c,k=q
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read from
        Returns:
        a new GarblerTranslator instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem reading the file
